name: Flying Dagger
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.Antimagic Susceptibility: The dagger is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the dagger must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
traits.False Appearance: While the dagger remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal dagger.
